overview: From 2025-06-01 to 2025-07-01, ethereum-optimism/docs had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: [DOCS] Add PR title
topIssues.author: cshein45
topIssues.body:
<!-- Please fill out the description and acceptance criteria to the best of your ability.
     While the other sections are optional, it makes resolving the issue much easier. -->

## Description  
This docs request relates to a Pull Request that introduces new functionality or significant changes. We need to add or update documentation to reflect these changes.

For example:  
- Add new section explaining the updated DAO voting logic introduced in PR #XYZ  
- Create a new page describing MOVE token staking, based on recent contract deployment  
- Clarify differences between community vs core contributor governance permissions

## Acceptance criteria  
- PR-related documentation is clear, concise, and accurate  
- All new features or changes reflected in public docs  
- Linked to relevant pages from the Table of Contents (if applicable)  
- Reviewed and approved by relevant SME or core contributor  
- Includes bilingual support (English + Burmese) where needed

## User stories  
- As a new community member, I want to understand the latest updates to the DAO process without reading the raw PR code  
- As a developer, I want clear documentation on how MOVE token staking works post-update  
- As a project steward, I want public docs to reflect reality so external contributors can stay aligned

## Resources and support  
- PR: [Link to PR]  
- Wiki: [https://wiki.movement.xyz/kokyat](https://wiki.movement.xyz/kokyat)  
- GitHub Repo: [https://github.com/movementlabsxyz](https://github.com/movementlabsxyz)  
- SMEs: KoKyat, ThaeThae, HanGyi  
- Whitepaper: [https://www.movementnetwork.xyz/whitepaper/movement-whitepaper_en.pdf](https://www.movementnetwork.xyz/whitepaper/movement-whitepaper_en.pdf)

## Action items  
1. Review the PR and associated technical changes  
2. Draft documentation (new page or updated section)  
3. Share with SMEs for accuracy check  
4. Peer review  
5. Final SME sign-off  
6. Publish to wiki or docs site

topPRs.title: Update data glossary
topPRs.author: krofax

topContributors.summary: krofax: This month, krofax focused on documentation improvements, opening a pull request to update the data glossary in `ethereum-optimism/docs#1651`. This work involved 22 commits and modified 23 files, with 232 additions and 158 deletions. Their activity shows a primary focus on documentation.
sebastianst: Contributed this month by participating in code review. They provided feedback on 2 pull requests, which included one approval and one comment.

yashvardhan-kukreja: Focused on identifying areas for improvement in the ethereum-optimism/optimism repository this month. They opened two issues, proposing the addition of flashblocks support in kurtosis (#16514) and suggesting enhancements to monitoring and alerting (#16388).

jvmi7: This month, jvmi7's efforts were directed towards defining new feature work within the Optimism ecosystem. They initiated the planning for a new feature by creating issue ethereum-optimism/ecosystem#868, which outlines the implementation of a claim contract deployment process for a mini app.
cshein45: This month, cshein45's contribution was focused on documentation process improvement, opening an issue in `ethereum-optimism/docs` to suggest adding PR titles (#1675).
